projectPurpose: To provide Windows 10 and 11 users with a highly customizable and modular desktop environment that enhances both aesthetics and productivity, without modifying core system files, offering a more personalized and efficient user experience than the default Windows UI.

alternatives.name: Rainmeter
mainFeatures: Shows system information, weather, RSS feeds

alternatives.name: RocketDock
alternatives.license: Freeware / Creative Commons License / MIT License
mainFeatures: Animated application launcher dock (Mac OS X style)

alternatives.name: WindowBlinds
mainFeatures: Customizable window elements, taskbar, start button

marketPositioning: Seelen-UI positions itself as a comprehensive, fully customizable desktop environment for Windows 10/11, going beyond the scope of tools focused solely on docks, widgets, or visual styles. Its webview-based, non-destructive approach, coupled with integrated productivity features like a tiling window manager and app launcher, differentiates it by offering a more cohesive and modern alternative UI experience than traditional customization tools. Its open-source nature also sets it apart from commercial alternatives.
